name: Basecamp Redmine
description: This style is just a simple copy-paste of Basecamp theme for Redmine. Especially useful for people that don't have admin access to their redmine installs, and can only change the theme by altering the css. IMPORTANT: After installing change the style URL to your current Redmine installation!
additional_info: Theme is created by Peter Theill, all credits should go to him. More info about the theme under the URL: http://www.redmine.org/projects/redmine/wiki/ThemeBasecamp
